name: df-ich
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0
body: |- wb(wich(s0, s1, w0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))), w0))))
comment: Define the propery of a wff ` ph ` that the setvar variables ` x ` and ` y ` are interchangeable. For an alternate definition using implicit substitution and a temporary setvar variable see ~ ichcircshi . Another, equivalent definition using two temporary setvar variables is provided in ~ dfich2 . (Contributed by AV, 29-Jul-2023.)
